name: Bootswatch style themes
description: Bootswatch is a collection of free themes for bootstrap.
need: We use bootswatch to provide different themes in our app. Themes can be predefined or chosen by user. Form.IO uses bootstrap styles so bootswatch themes are easily applied to Form.IO forms by replacing a bootstrap css file with a chosen bootswatch theme's css file
comment: We use a version compatible with bootstrap v3.3.7. There are newer version of bootstrap but Form.IO currently uses this version of bootstrap.

file.name: bootstrap.min
file.description: Bootstrap styles with the Cosmo Bootswatch theme applied. The Bluemeanie theme in our Header APP uses it as a body style as well as the Cosmo theme, but those two themes in the Header APP have different header styles.
